data.eml:eml: Description of two unknown females of Epeus Peckham & Peckham from China (Araneae: Salticidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Meng, Xiang-Wei, Zhang, Zhi-Sheng, Shi, Ai-Ming (2015): Description of two unknown females of Epeus Peckham & Peckham from China (Araneae: Salticidae). Zootaxa 3955 (1): 147-150, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3955.1.11
